body_html:
Hi @andrhua, we tend to make binaries available for things with stable api's, that we want to encourage the use of. There's no binary for this and it's never mentioned on tensorflow.org, which likely puts it in the category of internal details that regular users shouldn't rely-on.

Hey @suharshs, you're more familiar with the graph-transformation landscape. Do you know what the future holds for this tool?

body:
Hi @andrhua, we tend to make binaries available for things with stable api's, that we want to encourage the use of. There's no binary for this and it's never mentioned on tensorflow.org, which likely puts it in the category of internal details that regular users shouldn't rely-on.

Hey @suharshs, you're more familiar with the graph-transformation landscape. Do you know what the future holds for this tool?
